channel.title: Authors on Rohin Garg
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Rohin Garg

item.description:
I am a senior year undergrad at IIT Kanpur, majoring in Electrical Engineering. My interests vary from application of Math and Artificial Intelligence in real world problems including robotics and audio technology to solving algorithmic problems for fun. I am currently working with Prof. Vipul Arora in Music Information Retrieval, and am a part of institute IGVC team. I have previously interned at Adobe BEL labs where I worked with Reinforcement Learning and User Behaviour modelling.

Apart from my academic pursuits, I enjoy creating and covering music through all sorts of instruments, playing football for fun and lawn tennis for school.
